title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: I open a java editor. I am presented with a popup menu. Inside the menu, I can see two instances of the Revert option.
EB: I opened a java editor. I was presented with a popup menu. Upon inspection, I noticed that the Revert option was disabled, as it should be. To reproduce the bug: 1) Make the editor dirty. 2) Popup the menu.
SR: Build F1. 1) Open a java editor. 2) Popup the menu. One Revert option appears after UNDO, and the other Revert option appears before FORMAT.
